title: Topic 001 Question 271
body: A company wants to migrate its on-premises Microsoft SQL Server database server to the AWS Cloud. The company has decided to use Amazon EC2 instances to run this database.
Which of the following is the company responsible for managing, according to the AWS shared responsibility model?
options: Security patching of the guest operating system
Network connectivity of the host server
Uptime service level agreement (SLA) for the EC2 instances
